settings.title: Kai Avent-deLeon
settings.desc:
“Being a mom has taken priority for me — how I show up, not only for my son but for myself — and making sure that I'm being present and intentional every day.”

Read Kai Avant-deLeon’s Rose Inc Profile here.

settings.title: Orion Carloto
settings.desc:
“When I look at my mother and some of the other older women in my life, I am amazed by how wise and gorgeous a grown woman looks. Wrinkles, to me, are a form of growth in our lives. A gentle reminder in our tiny existence that we’ve spent our youngest years smiling, laughing, crying, and truly living.”

Read Orion Carloto’s Rose Inc profile here.

settings.title: Rosie Huntington-Whiteley
settings.desc:
“My mum always told me that makeup should enhance what you have and not hide what you have.”

Read Rosie Huntington-Whiteley’s Rose Inc profile here.

settings.title: Rajni Jacques
settings.desc:
“My mother and my grandmother have always been beautiful pillars in my life. They are both super strong women. My grandmother was a lawyer and my mother is a physician. It was amazing seeing them in positions where you didn’t always see Black women… They kept pushing, defying the odds.”

Read Rajni Jacques’ Rose Inc Profile here.

settings.quotes: “Sometimes I just find myself sitting with my daughter in my lap with this huge belly that has appeared now at six months. And I'm just in awe. My body did this. That's incredible.”

settings.title: Stephanie Liu Hjelmeseth
settings.desc:
“My mother is the strongest woman I know. Her experience as a working woman and selfless mother to three children gives me the courage to be fearless.”  

Read Stephanie Liu Hjelmeseth’s Rose Inc profile here.

settings.title: Alexis Foreman
settings.desc:
“Sometimes it’s just not realistic to be hard on yourself when you don’t achieve something, so I’m working on that. My son is really good at reminding me of that; he reminds me to go out and do something for myself when I’m stressed.”

Read Alexis Foreman’s Rose Inc Profile here.

settings.title: Babba Rivera
settings.desc:
“I feel very beautiful pregnant. It’s very empowering. Sometimes I just find myself sitting with my daughter in my lap with this huge belly that has appeared now at six months. And I'm just in awe. My body did this. That's incredible.”

Read Babba Rivera’s Rose Inc Profile here.

settings.title: Stella Simona
settings.desc:
“I want to continue to find balance and happiness. As a mother, my biggest goal is to make sure that my sons, Noah and Liam, have confidence in themselves.”

Read Stella Simona’s Rose Inc profile here.
